// import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "redux-first-router-link"; import * as paths from 'portal/state/location/paths'; export const ManageSidebar = ({ courseId}) => { const [ active, setActive ] = useState('goals') return (
  • Plan your course
    • setActive(paths.courseGoals)} to={`/instructor/course/${courseId}/manage/goals`} > Target your students
  • Create your content
    • setActive(paths.courseCurriculum)} to={`/instructor/course/${courseId}/manage/curriculum`} > Curriculum
  • Publish your course
    • setActive(paths.courseGoals)} to={`/instructor/course/${courseId}/manage/basics`} > Course landing page
    • Pricing
    • Course messages
); };
